content_en:
Moldtelecom Launches Speedtest.net Server with Speeds up to 100 Gbps ‚Äì A First in Moldova

Chi»ôinƒÉu, May 2025 ‚Äì Moldtelecom continues to strengthen Moldova‚Äôs position on the global digital map with the launch of a new public Speedtest.net server capable of handling speeds up to 100 Gbps. This is the highest publicly testable speed in the country and one of the highest in the region.

üîπ Top Performance
The server, available since March within the SCIRCE infrastructure (Centralized Internet and Computing Resource System), is configured on next-gen equipment connected via interfaces over 100 Gbps. It is intended for both advanced users and companies seeking to test ultra-fast connections in a professional environment.

‚ÄúThis achievement proves that Moldtelecom‚Äôs digital infrastructure is ready to meet the highest demands in IT and telecommunications. We provide not just connectivity, but a modern framework for innovation and digital development,‚Äù a Moldtelecom representative stated.

Real Test Results
A test performed via command line interface (CLI), the recommended method for extreme speeds, produced the following impressive results:
Download: 94.4 Gbps
Upload: 75.4 Gbps
Ping: 0.12 ms
Packet loss: 0.0%
Jitter: under 1 ms

üîó Full result available here

Tools for High-Speed Testing
Important note: such speeds can only be achieved via terminal, not through browsers, as most personal computers can‚Äôt handle such high data streams. Also, 100 Gbps-compatible networking equipment is required.

What Does This Mean for Moldova?
The launch of this server is not just a technological step, but a clear signal that Moldova has entered the top league of global connectivity. Academic institutions, tech companies, cloud service providers, and telecom operators now have direct access to an advanced testing platform from Chi»ôinƒÉu.

Moldtelecom is the leading telecommunications operator in the Republic of Moldova, offering Internet, TV, fixed and mobile phone services. With robust infrastructure and continuous investment in innovation, the company plays a key role in digitalizing the country and shaping a connected future.

title_en: Moldtelecom Invests in the Future of Connectivity: New Licenses for 700 and 900 MHz Bands
content_ro:
Moldtelecom investe»ôte √Æn viitorul conectivitƒÉ»õii: noi licen»õe pentru frecven»õele 700 »ôi 900 MHz, fundament pentru extinderea serviciilor mobile »ôi pregƒÉtirea re»õelei 5G

Moldtelecom anun»õƒÉ o nouƒÉ etapƒÉ strategicƒÉ √Æn dezvoltarea infrastructurii digitale na»õionale, prin ob»õinerea licen»õelor de utilizare a frecven»õelor radio √Æn benzile 700 MHz »ôi 900 MHz. Aceste resurse de spectru, esen»õiale pentru √ÆmbunƒÉtƒÉ»õirea serviciilor mobile, vor sus»õine extinderea conectivitƒÉ»õii √Æn √Æntreaga »õarƒÉ »ôi vor contribui decisiv la pregƒÉtirea pentru viitoarea re»õea 5G.

Licen»õele, acordate de ANRCETI √Æn urma unui concurs oficial, sunt valabile pentru o perioadƒÉ de 25 de ani »ôi vor permite Moldtelecom sƒÉ √ÆmbunƒÉtƒÉ»õeascƒÉ acoperirea re»õelei mobile √Æn zonele rurale, periferice »ôi √Æn interiorul clƒÉdirilor ‚Äì acolo unde accesul la servicii de calitate este √ÆncƒÉ limitat.

Tehnologie care ajunge mai departe

Prin integrarea acestora √Æn portofoliul existent, Moldtelecom consolideazƒÉ performan»õa re»õelei 4G »ôi creeazƒÉ o bazƒÉ tehnologicƒÉ solidƒÉ pentru trecerea cƒÉtre 5G.

Un angajament pe termen lung pentru o MoldovƒÉ digitalƒÉ
AceastƒÉ investi»õie reflectƒÉ o viziune care pune √Æn centru infrastructura, incluziunea digitalƒÉ »ôi egalitatea de acces. Moldtelecom contribuie activ la reducerea decalajului digital »ôi la transformarea digitalƒÉ a √Æntregii societƒÉ»õi.

‚ÄûPentru noi, conectivitatea nu este doar un serviciu, ci o responsabilitate. Investim √Æn frecven»õele potrivite, la momentul potrivit, pentru a construi o re»õea modernƒÉ, fiabilƒÉ »ôi pregƒÉtitƒÉ pentru viitor ‚Äì o re»õea care sƒÉ fie aproape de oameni, oriunde s-ar afla‚Äù, a declarat directorul general S.A. Moldtelecom.

Moldtelecom este liderul na»õional √Æn telecomunica»õii, oferind servicii convergente »ôi solu»õii digitale pentru to»õi clien»õii. Compania este un pilon al digitalizƒÉrii √Æn Republica Moldova.
content_en:
Moldtelecom Invests in the Future of Connectivity: New Licenses for 700 and 900 MHz Bands as a Foundation for Mobile Service Expansion and 5G Preparation

Moldtelecom announces a new strategic phase in the development of the national digital infrastructure through the acquisition of radio frequency licenses in the 700 MHz and 900 MHz bands. These spectrum resources are essential for improving mobile services and will support nationwide connectivity expansion and the future deployment of 5G.

The licenses, granted by ANRCETI after an official competition, are valid for 25 years and will enable Moldtelecom to enhance mobile network coverage in rural, remote, and indoor areas‚Äîwhere quality service access is still limited.

Technology That Reaches Further
The lower frequencies in the 700 and 900 MHz bands are known for their ability to cover large areas and penetrate obstacles. By integrating them into its existing portfolio, Moldtelecom strengthens 4G performance and establishes a solid foundation for the 5G transition.

A Long-Term Commitment for a Digital Moldova
This investment reflects a long-term vision centered on infrastructure, digital inclusion, and equal access. Moldtelecom actively contributes to closing the digital divide and advancing the digital transformation of society.

‚ÄúFor us, connectivity is not just a service, it‚Äôs a responsibility. We invest in the right frequencies at the right time to build a modern, reliable, and future-ready network‚Äîone that‚Äôs close to people, wherever they are,‚Äù stated the General Director of S.A. Moldtelecom.

Moldtelecom is the national leader in telecommunications, offering converged services and digital solutions for individuals, companies, and public institutions. The company plays a key role in Moldova‚Äôs digital transformation.
